description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands the page with title "The Store"
Go to shoes category
Click on the first product and verify user lands on PDP page
Add product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that the product is there.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' into the respective login fields.
Click the login button to submit the credentials.
Verify that the landing page displays the title 'The Store'.
Click on the 'Shoes' category from the navigation menu or category list.
Click on the first product, and verify that user lands on PDP page by verifying product name.
Click on the 'Add to Cart' button on the product detail page.
Navigate to the cart page by clicking on the cart icon or link.
Verify that the product added is present in the cart.
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm successful operation.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, navigate, add product and verify cart

description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands the page with title "The Store"
Add to cart the first product in "Just In" section of the page.
Go to cart page and verify that price is reflected correctly.
Increase quality by 1 using dropdown, and verify that the prices adjusts accordingly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' into the login form fields.
Click the login button to log in.
Verify that the landing page title is 'The Store'.
Scroll down using PageDown if needed to view the 'Just In' section.
Locate the 'Just In' section and click on the 'Add to Cart' button for the first product.
Navigate to the cart page by clicking the cart icon or link.
Verify that the product price in the cart is displayed correctly.
Select the quantity dropdown and increase the product quantity by 1.
Verify that the cart price adjusts accordingly after updating the quantity.
Take a screenshot of the completed cart page to confirm the test was successful.

description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Verify that user lands the page with title "The Store"
Add to cart the first product in "Just In" section of the page.
Go to cart page and verify that cart is not empty
Click the delete icon (svg) to remove the item
verify user gets "Your cart is empty" message

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL: http://localhost:3005
Enter username 'test_user_name' and password 'test_password' in the login form
Click on the login button
Verify that the landing page shows the title 'The Store'
Locate the 'Just In' section on the page
Add the first product from the 'Just In' section to the cart
Navigate to the cart page
Verify that the cart is not empty
Click the delete icon (svg) to remove the item from the cart
Verify that the message 'Your cart is empty' is displayed
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm successful test execution

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Login, add product to cart, delete product
